Key Match Events: Andy Ibáñez delivered a three-RBI triple in the eighth inning of Game 2
Post-Match Reflections: The Astros failed to reach the ALCS for the first time since 2016
This marks the first time the franchise has been swept out of the first round of the postseason since the 2001 NLDS
Future Hall of Fame pitcher Justin Verlander, who was left off the Astros' playoff roster due to late-season struggles, is set to have his contract expire
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Detroit Tigers completed a sweep in the best-of-three AL Wild Card Series
The Astros posted the best record in the AL from then on out, going 81-54 after April 25
The Tigers won their first playoff series since 2013
The Astros' dynasty, which has loomed large over the rest of the league for a nearly a decade, may be coming to an end
Others: The Astros opened the regular season 7-19, their worst start in 55 years

Kyle Tucker, Yordan Alvarez, Chas McCormick, Framber Valdez, Hunter Brown and Bryan Abreu are among the long list of players on the Astros' playoff roster who have never had their big league season end this early
